entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 March 2023
